data.text: @Maps83F1 Hi there. If you have any queries regarding your online order, please contact our appointed handling agent - GO Logistics & Storage through email address cx_customerservices@gols.com.hk Thank you. - Anna

data.text: @nleenk We will continue to work closely with the authorities on the case. (2/2)

@nleenk We are following the health authorities’ prescribed procedures in conducting disinfection of both aircraft and informing the operating crew and employees, as well as assisting the authorities’ efforts in tracing people who were in close contact with the concerned passenger. (1/2)
@Sharmilla01 Can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@abhi_kanodia803 Can you inbox us with your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? -Ella https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
On-ground and at 35,000 feet, we’ve set new ambitions for 2020 and ahead. Here’s how we’re going to #MoveBeyond, and take you on this journey with us: https://t.co/cDaDb0iPna https://t.co/DMkuhZKHP2

@rutharcher98 Passengers are advised to check their Flight Status (for departures within the next 3 days) or the Flight Timetable (for later departures) on our website for the latest flight information. (2/2) -Ella

@rutharcher98 We are actively reviewing our flight schedules at the moment and will be updating them progressively over the next 48 hours. (1/2)
 -Ella

urls.title: Online Flight Booking | Airfare | United States - Cathay Pacific
urls.description: Book flights to Hong Kong, Manila, Bangkok, Cebu, Vancouver and other destinations with Cathay Pacific. You can also manage bookings and view your frequent flyer account online.
